title: Quinn's Way
description: Her future landed in her lap!The sexy stranger who tumbled from her apple tree into Houston Malloy's lap was surely heaven sent. The man had a mouth-watering smile and bedroom eyes - but then she noticed his strange skintight silver suit...He was out of this world!One wrong turn and Quinn had fallen through a crack in time - right into three hundred years in the past...and straight into the arms of the woman of his dreams. One kiss from Houston Malloy and his pulse beat faster than high-speed hurtles through time. Quinn had made quantum leaps for mankind - but now, could he dare go back to the future?
author: Rebecca Flanders
